text_block_list.text:
It's finally the weekend. I head to the<n>mall to get some
shopping done and<n>spot the one and only Mihono<n>
Bourbon.

She's standing outside of an arcade,<n>eyes fixed on the
neon contraptions<n>inside.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I have observed that this arcade is<n>frequented by
Umamusume with a<n>high "sociability" parameter.<n>
However, I am unsure whether to<n>enter.

After pressing for more details, she<n>tells me that the arcade
is popular<n>among her classmates, so she came<n>to check it
out as a conversational<n>topic.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...I have difficulty operating machinery<n>and am liable to
destroy electronic<n>devices I come in contact with. I<n>
assessed the machines in the arcade<n>and concluded that
risk management<n>would be necessary

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: due to their size.

For both Bourbon's sake and the<n>machines', I offer to
show her around.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I greatly appreciate your cooperation.

Waving my hand, I motion that it's no<n>problem. I decide that
it would be safer<n>to have me controlling the arcade<n>
machines instead of her.
choice_data_list: It's not often we get to have days off. Let's have fun!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Understood. Initiating "let's have fun"<n>protocol.
And so, our tour of the arcade begins.

text_block_list.name: Rock, Paper, Scissors Game
text_block_list.text: Rock, paper, scissors, shoot! Sorry,<n>you lost!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
One win, nine losses. A substantial<n>drop in your happiness
has been<n>detected. May I offer some ice<n>cream? Sweets
are known for their<n>mood-boosting properties.

text_block_list.name: Slot Machine
text_block_list.text: Drumroll please... Congratulations!<n>You win!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
A considerable amount of coins are<n>spilling out of this
machine. Is it<n>malfunctioning?

text_block_list.name: Punching Bag Machine
text_block_list.text: 16,000 points! You sent that monster<n>flying!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Punching power has been recorded<n>as 16,000 points in my
database. Unit<n>of measurement unknown.

Despite her rather unorthodox<n>reactions, I can see Mihono
Bourbon<n>is enjoying the arcade.

It would be a waste to go home<n>without her playing at least
one game,<n>though. After a few minutes of<n>searching, I
point at a crane game.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Is this what you wish for me to play?<n>Your invitation is
appreciated, but my<n>estimations show that I may<n>
permanently put this device out of<n>service.
choice_data_list: Don't worry. I'll take care of the controls.
Don't worry, I'll take care of the controls.

text_block_list.text:
I ask her to watch from the side and<n>provide instructions.
Content, Mihono<n>Bourbon nods and positions herself.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Understood. I will calculate distances<n>and supply directions.

Sliding a coin into the slot, the<n>machine whirs to life. We
begin aiming<n>for a bunny perched on top of the<n>toys.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Please move twenty-two<n>centimeters—yes, stop right there.<n>
According to my analysis, we have a<n>98% chance of
success.

Nodding, I press the button to grab the<n>prize. The plastic
claw wraps around<n>the toy's neck.
Flop.
The prize slips out and lands back<n>where it started.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...Lack of grip strength, noted.<n>Adjusting calculations.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Initiating a new course of<n>action—pushing. With this, we
have an<n>estimated 91% chance of—
Flop.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...I have overestimated the arm's<n>maneuvering ability once
again.<n>Reanalyzing.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I predict a 75% chance of success—
Flop.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ... ...This contraption is proving to be a<n>fearsome foe.

I use up every trick I know, but the<n>stuffed animal remains
unattainable.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
My apologies, Trainer. My failure in<n>ascertaining the arm's
strength led to<n>such disappointing results.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...However, I believe there is a 70%<n>chance that we will
procure the prize<n>on our next turn. I suggest a final<n>
attempt.
The sudden proposal contradicts herusual passive attitude. She must beREALLY determined to win.
choice_data_list: Let's do it! We're definitely gonna get it this time!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Understood. I will try my absolute<n>best.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Please stop there. Now move forward<n>by fourteen
centimeters. We will push<n>the toy to the very edge and allow
it to<n>fall naturally into the prize box.

Biting my lip, I press the button to<n>grab the bunny. It falls,
balancing<n>precariously on the edge of the hole.

I hold my breath as if any movement<n>would throw the
stuffed animal back<n>toward its friends. Glancing to my<n>
side, I notice Mihono Bourbon doing<n>the same.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...Come on!

After losing its battle with gravity, the<n>bunny slides
gracefully into the prize<n>box.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Thank you for your support. I am now<n>equipped to handle
conversations<n>about arcades. What's most<n>interesting,
however, is that I<n>experienced new sensations today.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
During our attempts at the claw game,<n>I observed new
physical responses. A<n>ticklish feeling occurred inside my<n>
chest, along with involuntary<n>movements of my facial
muscles. I<n>have added these new

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: responses to my "small talk"<n>parameters.
choice_data_list: It sounds like you had lots of fun.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...Is this what you define "fun" as?

Mihono Bourbon slowly lets the word<n>fall out of her mouth,
as if uncertain<n>about its pronunciation. I gently<n>explain
what those feelings mean.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I see now.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
It seems illogical to experience "fun"<n>while doing something
unproductive<n>such as capturing stuffed animals<n>with
implausibly weak mechanical<n>arms.
choice_data_list: Well, I wouldn't call it that...

text_block_list.text:
Carefully choosing my words, I<n>express the value of doing
so-called<n>"unproductive" things from time to<n>time.
choice_data_list: The main purpose is to enjoy ourselves.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...I see. All of this information is quite<n>novel to me. It seems
that I have<n>entered a state of "shock" now.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I will input this new information in as<n>well. Perhaps
seemingly meaningless<n>events are not so meaningless
after<n>all.

Gently petting the bunny we got<n>together, Mihono Bourbon
ponders<n>over her newly gleaned perspectives.
